idea: Aavishkar Solar going to fulfill requirement of Indian make solar PV Panels which will be used for various solar solutions. Currently Indian Solar Industry is struggling for Quality Indian made solar panels, Aavishkar solar will provide various type of solar panels for best solar solutions. We are bound to provide a best quality product of market to our customers. Automation in entire manufacturing setup  i.e. Raw Material Testing, Pre-production material handling, production, post production quality checkup, packing will be involved so production will be fast, reliable,  contain less human errors &will provide  best quality output. Aavishkar Solar is ISO 9001:2015 organization which implement lean & Six Sigma methodology for continuous process improvement. Aavishkar Solar has BHAG to establish capacity of 3GW Solar Panel manufacturing by 2022.
name: AAVISHKAR SOLAR POWER LIMITED LIABILITY PARTNERSHIP

idea: UserExperior has built a product which monitors mobile app user experience using a SDK which is very light and also has the capability to create video of end users sessions without impacting user privacy. It further helps in improving app experience, fraud session analysis, quick troubleshooting, better customer support. The product can be plugged into any mobile app whoes digital experience is to be improved which will further help in increasing user retention and conversion.
name: USEREXPERIOR TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Sepio is a technology platform focused on digital supply chain transformation and security. We do this by creating unique digital identities at the SKU level, which can be aggregated up to any level (e.g., carton, pallet).

 

Our mission is to make the world better one product at a time by reducing supply chain theft and pilferage, tampering, counterfeiting, and other supply chain inefficiencies, the repercussions of which range from significant financial loss for companies to negative impact on the health of individuals.

 

Sepio’s award winning solutions helps companies to:

•  TRACK: Track and trace products from factory to fork

•  SECURE: Secure goods in transit from theft/pilferage

• VERIFY: Protect the brand against counterfeiting and tampering and enable consumers to use their smartphones to verify the authenticity of the product

•  ENGAGE: Get products to speak directly to consumers on the retail shelf to drive purchase intent

 

We are on well on our way to impacting millions of lives across the world. More than 2,500 customers across industries such as logistics, exporters, FMCG, pharmaceuticals, government etc. see value in using Sepio's solution to secure their supply chain.
name: SEPIO PRODUCTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Projected Profitability Statement Considering 10 Schools per year having 1000 student strength generates 50 lakh revenue for company. Aslo creates employment is well to handle all the operations. Our Future Plans are Make it in dual mode i.e. Offline & Online, Institute Centralization Module, Mobile Application, Bus Tracking Application, Time Table module.
name: MAYARA TSI PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Team consists of US and India based Cyber security and IT leaders who plan to develop Cyber & IT products in India and provide Cyber & IT services. We will leverage existing US based products to solve Indian Cyber Security Concerns. Whereever required, we are planning to create India based products for Cyber security. Team consist of many industry veterans with 15+ years of business, IT and Cyber consulting & Product Development experience.
name: ARYAV SECURITY CONSULTING AND RESEARCH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We will be acting as Procurement & Fulfillment agents on behalf of foreign Buyers mainly retail Brands. Who will appoint us as their single window agents. This will reduce the logistic cost for Indian Vendors & transparency in delivering to the foreign buyers. We   will be refurnishing their goods in our warehouse in India and then delivering it to their retail outlet, which will enable them to take late deliveries from our Indian origin suppliers which is currently 5 months prior to their season.My organisation will generate foreign exchange for the value additional services; which the buyers are currently doing at destination/importing country.
name: CLEAR GLOBAL PROCUREMENT & FULFILLMENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a new startup in E-commerce/Marketplace Industry and have an Idea or platform to allow Merchants to sell their products to end no of buyers across India. 

Our startup wants to help the Offline Vendors/Merchants Selling goods/products on the Street/Shop/Malls etc to connect with the entire world through the Medium of Internet and Social Sites. This would help them to meet & connect end no of buyers throughout the border and help them to establish in a Nationalize Market.

This would also help them in getting Digital India Knowledge by using banking services for their business transaction and would help in scaling more offline or cash traders getting on-board into digital banking system.

On the other way round it would also be beneficial for the Buyers to meet end of products sold across India or famous products of different states. 

We would help Merchant selling products on our platform with different way, which would help an 'uneducated' or 'not not use to' the digital environment by providing them most kind of services such as Logistics, Payment Integration and much more for selling out their goods to different buyers with their Identity on our platform. This would help the Merchant to grow not only in the Local Market but also in the National Market, 

'shopmojoz' and its 'team members' wants the startup India help to grow and provide solutions to such Merchant to expand and grow and fulfill their business wishes. 

The main Motto of the 'shopmojoz' and the startup is to develop something new, better and in the easy manner for the People of India, so that they could be adjusted freely in the Modernization and Environment of Internet to help India Grow and should be 100% Made In India and Made for India.
name: Shopmojoz

idea: We have developed a Robotic Milk Collection Unit (RMCU) which would help to automize the milk collection system in India, which includes automated sample collection and analysis when the farmer delivers the milk at the milk society. All the farmer data and pouring pattern data is transferred on the Cloud system. This will help in analyzing the farmer pattern and help transfer the funds directly to the Bank account of the farmer. Moreover the use of this data can help the farmer get Bank Loans, subsidy and many other benefits
name: WHITE GOLD TECHNOLOGIES LLP

idea: This Company is in early stage so the employment generation is low but in future the employment will increase once patent will be approved. Our Company is Manufacturer of “ILLUSION SOLITAIRE DIAMOND JEWELRY". We make Jewelry in all Solitaire Brilliant Shapes but with Special Cut Diamonds from Rough diamond which makes our Jewelry look like Solitaire Diamond Jewelry & it will be nearly 70% cheaper than Solitaire Diamond with same color, clarity, diameter & nearly same Look also. This Jewelries are with Lab certification & also with buy back & exchange offer.
name: ILLUSION SOLITAIRE DIAMOND JEWELLERY LLP
